summary: This module supplies core components for the CloudFormation graph builder, including a specialized block class that wraps template elements with utilities for property access, identifier sanitization, breadcrumb metadata, and change tracking, as well as a generic encryption handler that maps resource types to appropriate encryption/decryption logic.
business_intent: Facilitate accurate construction of a resource graph for CloudFormation templates, enabling downstream security and compliance analysis by providing enriched node representations and automated handling of encrypted resource attributes.
